column2:
ggplot(economics, aes(x = date, y = unemploy)) +
  geom_rect(data = presidential, aes(NULL, NULL, xmin = start, xmax = end, fill = party),
            ymin = 0, ymax = 16000, alpha = 0.4, alpha = 0.1,colour = "gray") +
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Democratic" = "blue", "Republican" = "tomato")) +
  geom_text(data=presidential,aes(x=start+500, y=3000,label=name), size=2) +
  labs(title = "Unemployment in the US", x = "Date", y = "Unemployment",fill = "Government")
Duplicated aesthetics after name standardisation: alpha
